mapper.select: SELECT D.ADDRESS, D.APP_DATE, SUGG_CNT, D.SERV_ID, D.PER_BUD, D.SERV_DATE FROM ( SELECT C.*, ROWNUM AS NUM FROM ( SELECT ADDRESS, TO_CHAR(APP_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) APP_DATE , ( SELECT COUNT(SUGG_ID) FROM CRD_SERV_SUGG B WHERE B.SERV_ID = A.SERV_ID) AS SUGG_CNT , SERV_ID, PER_BUD, TO_CHAR(SERV_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS' ) SERV_DATE FROM CRD_SERV_APP A WHERE CUSTOMER_ID = #{memId} ) C ) D WHERE NUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

SELECT M.NAME ,TO_CHAR(A.SERV_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SERV_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.APP_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS APP_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.MODIFIED_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFIED_DATE ,TO_CHAR(A.END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_DATE ,A.* FROM CRD_SERV_APP A, CRD_MEM M WHERE A.CUSTOMER_ID = M.MEM_ID AND SERV_ID = #{appliId}
